初遇.encontent:
Ah! The troopers are here! Get out of ...  Huh? You
 are not one of them? I am so, so sorry!
初遇.content:
啊！追兵追上来了，快点离开这里……啊？您不是追兵吗
？实在、实在是对不起！

箱中气候.encontent:
What a nice day. There will be such a large audience
 to ... night. Ah! My stomach, it hurts ... so much
 ... I'm not lying!
箱中气候.content:
今天的天气不错，晚上一定会有很多观众……的。啊！我
的肚子好疼，真的好疼，是……是真的！

致未来.encontent:
Even if we do go back to the future, I still wanna
 go back farming ... Grow some potatoes, corn, raise
 some cattle.
致未来.content:
就算真的回到了未来，我也还是想回家种地……我可以种
点土豆，还有玉米，再养一些牛。

孑立.encontent:
Silence on the stage is only a tiny lingering charm before the
 next magnificent show ... Um, what am I talking about! ... Whew,
 thank goodness nobody noticed me.
孑立.content:
舞台也会有沉寂之时。不过，这只是下一场盛大演出前，不
值一提的余韵而已——呃、我在说什么啊！……呜，幸好
没有人注意到我。

朝晨.encontent:
Beautiful sunshine means a beautiful day ... Hmm, people
 like me, who cannot do anything well, really don't
 deserve to be standing in the sun ...
朝晨.content:
美好的阳光象征着美好的一天……呜，像我这样什么都做
不好的人，实在羞愧于站在阳光下……

信任-朝晨.encontent:
Good morning. Why am I in a good mood today, you ask?
 Because the company takes a day off.
信任-朝晨.content:
早上好～我看起来心情很好吗？大概是因为今天剧团休息
吧……

夜暮.encontent:
Everyone else is ready? Mmm ... my feet ... I can't
 move my feet!
夜暮.content:
其他人已经准备就绪了吗？呜呜……脚、脚怎么走不动了
！

信任-夜暮.encontent: The light is on ... It's time for me to go on stage.
信任-夜暮.content: 舞台的灯光已经亮起……到了不得不上场的时候了啊……

帽檐与发鬓.encontent:
The illusion I create can only fool the eyes ... My
 arcane skill is not of much use.
帽檐与发鬓.content:
我所制造的幻象是只能骗到眼睛的假象……是个没什么用
的神秘术。

袖与手.encontent:
If none of these troubles had happened ... I would
 probably be milking the cow right now ... *sighs*
袖与手.content: 如果没有这趟子乱事儿，我现在还在挤牛奶吧……啊……

衣着与身形.encontent:
... It's indeed too much!I've told the cast do not
 pick this outfit ...
衣着与身形.content:
……果然还是太华丽了！我早就跟团员们说过不要选这套
了……

嗜好.encontent:
Only when standing on the stage, when saying the lines
 ... Could I forget the fact that I'm such a useless,
 undeserving person ...
嗜好.content:
唯有在舞台之上，唯有说出那一句句台词的时候……我才
能够忘记自己是一个无能的、不值得期待的人……

赞赏.encontent:
Br ... brilliant! Your achievements are soaring like
 a harrier in the sky, one can only admire but not
 be cynical.
赞赏.content:
太、太厉害了！您的杰出功绩，如同飞翔于天际之鹞鸥一
般。让人唯有赞叹，而无嫉恨。

亲昵.encontent: I ... I will be brave ... Just like you!
亲昵.content: 我、我会勇敢起来的……像你一样！

闲谈Ⅰ.encontent:
People, people! Why are we wooing for our own destruction?
 Why not just take my word and go back home farming?!
闲谈Ⅰ.content:
剧团、剧团！我们为什么要找死呢？！听我一句劝，大家
收拾行李回乡下养牛种地不好吗？！

闲谈Ⅱ.encontent:
An't be my destiny, so. An't be not, so. He that dies
 this year is quit for the next.
闲谈Ⅱ.content:
死也好，活也罢，这都是命运。今年死了明年总不会再死
。

独白.encontent:
Each one of us struggles to survive for a certain reason. Bloodline,
 responsibility, pursuit, vocation ... If the illusion I created
 could be one of their reasons ... that would be enough.
独白.content:
我们每个人都是为了某些理由而坚持生存的。血脉、责任
、理想、使命……如果我制造的幻影或许能够成为某个人
的理由……这就足够了。

入队.encontent:
Don ... don't look at me ... I'm not the one you saw
 on the wanted list ...
入队.content: 别、别看我，我不是你们在通缉令上看到的人……

战前.encontent:
Did the show begin? Excellent, get ready to step onto
 the stage.
战前.content: 演出开始了吗？很好，准备步入舞台吧。

择选至终的仪式.encontent: This shall be my only act!

战斗胜利.encontent: That's what you've got? ... Huh? I'm sorry!
战斗胜利.content: 你们就这种水平吗？……啊？对不起！

洞悉.encontent:
Umm ... Are you sure you're not making a mistake ...
 choosing me?
洞悉.content: 唔……您没有搞错什么东西吧……真的是我吗？

洞悉之底.encontent:
Aye ... aye! Be it tyrant or tyranny, people's right
 for joy cannot be snatched away.
洞悉之底.content:
没错……没错！不管是暴君还是暴力，都无法夺走人们的
欢愉的权利。
